title: Internet service provider market share in Vietnam fourth quarter 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
There is a difference of 50.0 between the maximum Company VNPT and minimum Company Others.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
There is a difference of 50.0 between the maximum Company VNPT and minimum Company Others.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 4 number of Companys.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.
The second highest Market share is appeared to be the Company FPT Telecom.
The highest Company VNPT has 50.0 more Market share than the lowest Company Others.
The Company VNPT has the highest Market share, followed by FPT Telecom, and Viettel. Down to the Company Others which is the lowest.
The highest value 56.6 at VNPT is almost 2.26 times larger than the average value 25.0.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 100.0.
